long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ü§ñ recommen.do: Simplify Your Shopping with AI Recommendations

Make your online shopping experience even better with recommen.do, a helpful shopping companion powered by OpenAI. Created using Next.js 13 and Plasmo, recommen.do is a free extension that makes searching for products on popular platforms like Amazon, Newegg, and eBay much easier.

Key Features of recommen.do:

üõçÔ∏è Personalized shopping recommendations: Get suggestions for products tailored to your preferences on Amazon, Newegg, and eBay.

üïí View and manage history: Easily access and review your browsing history of recommended products.

üöÄ Direct prompting: Prompt OpenAI directly from your search results, allowing you to get recommendations without leaving the page.

üî• Use your own API key: No subscription? No problem, you can seamlessly integrate your own OpenAI API key.

üí° 10 Free Recommendations: Sign up for recommen.do and receive 10 free recommendations.

Install the recommen.do extension today and let AI assist you in your shopping.

We're dedicated to constantly improving your experience with recommen.do. We value your feedback and questions. Please reach out to us at hey@recommen.do or by visiting https://www.recommen.do/contact and let us know how we can improve.

---------

By using this add-on, you agree to the recommen.do Terms & Conditions available at https://www.recommen.do/terms
